description: Try our easy to follow Yoghurt, Berry & Granola Pots recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Granola,Pescatarian,Orange,Halal,Seafood free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Easter
name: Yoghurt, Berry & Granola Pots Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put orange juice, grated rind and honey in a small saucepan. Bring to a simmer, turn off the heat and let cool.
Gently toss the berries in the orange syrup.
Divide 1/3 of the berry mixture between 4 glasses.
Top with spoonfuls of the yoghurt, scatter on half the granola, and repeat again loosely layering each ingredient until finished.
